title: El Paso Independent School District / Homepage
cleaned_text: TOP NEWS - [A Message from Diana Sayavedra](../../site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=101&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=55033&PageID=1) El Paso ISD Superintendent Diana Sayavedra updates the community on the district's recent highlights and upcoming events. - [Family Resource Center at Cooley Elementary School accepts donation of school supplies from Rogelio Sanchez State Jail](../../site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=101&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=55032&PageID=1) Cooley Elementary School's Family Resource Center received a donation of school supplies from the Rogelio Sanchez State Jail, ensuring continued access to resources for the campus community. - [El Paso ISD launches Reconnect EPISD Attendance/Recovery Walk initiative aimed at bolstering daily attendance](../../site/default.aspx?PageType=3&DomainID=4&ModuleInstanceID=101&ViewID=6446EE88-D30C-497E-9316-3F8874B3E108&RenderLoc=0&FlexDataID=55030&PageID=1) El Paso ISD administrators were joined by city leaders as the district launched its Reconnect EPISD Attendance/Recovery Walk initiative aimed at promoting consistent attendance. Watch Us Now What's Happening in EPISD - Tomorrow - - Tuesday 8:00 AM [Parent/Teacher Conference - Early Release Elementary Only]( https://www.episd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20230912/event/62785) - 3:00 PM [Special Board Meeting]( https://www.episd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20230912/event/62952) - 5:00 PM [Board of Trustees Meeting]( https://www.episd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20230912/event/62953) - - - Friday 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM [National Hispanic Heritage Month]( https://www.episd.org/site/Default.aspx?PageID=2&DomainID=4#calendar1/20230915/event/52894) - September 20, 2023 - September 23, 2023 - October 2, 2023 - October 3, 2023 - October 4, 2023 - October 5, 2023 - October 6, 2023 - October 7, 2023 - October 8, 2023 - October 9, 2023 - October 10, 2023 - October 11, 2023 - October 12, 2023 - October 13, 2023 - November 10, 2023 - November 20, 2023 - November 21, 2023 - November 22, 2023 - November 23, 2023 - November 24, 2023 - December 22, 2023 - December 25, 2023 [View Calendar](/Page/2) Good to know - [Click for Back to School Resources](https://www.episd.org/backtoschool) Parent/Teacher Conference - Early Release Sept 12 - 14 Immunization Clinics Flu Shot & COVID Booster [locations & schedule](https://www.episd.org/Page/14342) EPISD By The Numbers This is additional text here for description
